scripts.py:test: cd functions && uv run python -m pytest tests
scripts.py:test-cov: cd functions && uv run python -m pytest tests --cov=src --cov-report=term-missing
scripts.py:quality: npm run py:lint && npm run py:format && npm run py:typecheck
scripts.quality:full: npm run typecheck && npm run py:quality
scripts.clean: find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
